verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Mighty warrior
Dressed for battle
Holy Lord of all is He
Commander in chief
Bring us to attention
Lead us into battle
To crush the enemy

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Satan has no authority
Here in this place
He has no authority here
For this habitation
Was fashioned for the Lord's presence
No authority here

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus has all authority
Here in this place
He has all authority here
For this habitation
Was fashioned for the Lord's presence
All authority here
